title: Instructional Design Scenarios for Developing Computer Science Teacher Competency Assessment Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Learners focus on developing self-efficacy assessment tools, cultivating application skills through actual case analysis. Conducted through a blended approach combining online (lectures/material research) and offline (workshops/team projects) components

learning_goals: Explain the four core domains of computer science teacher competency assessment: content knowledge, instructional design, classroom management, and professional development
Design validity verification procedures for assessment tools using structural equation modeling
Write a report analyzing self-efficacy differences based on demographic variables (age, career stage, school size, etc.)

resources: Thai CS Teacher Self-Efficacy Study Data Sample

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
